text: 2.17-18: Stt 35.19 naŋga, Jer 31.15Muhɨmɨmuhɨm vana kanɨŋɨnɨŋɨrɨm Got ambahi, kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara Jeremaia ambami, Pɨhu Rama, Resel nɨŋuñɨŋgiñandu ñɨŋisɨm kɨmumbɨramu. Kamatɨhu ñɨŋi nɨŋumɨnava haŋɨnɨŋ irɨhɨnzɨhi tamamu. Kamatɨhu krunavundi muŋɨnɨŋ pata nurɨŋ mɨŋañɨŋarɨtɨrɨŋ mavɨñam hañɨ kɨyɨmu vata andɨhura kambu maŋindarɨmu, vamba ambami haŋandɨhin, kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ yɨvurahami.
